288308.<center>アストルティア上空に現れた 浮遊都市……\n天星郷フォーリオンへ:
A floating city had appeared in the skies
above Astoltia... An angel named Yuliza claimed
to be an Angel of Guidance, and led you to that
city, known as the Firmament. There, you were
told that you must obtain a great power in order
to protect the world. Using the Soul Candelabra to
travel to the Firmament, you were suddenly attacked
by an unknown object and crash landed somewhere.

288309.<center>墜落した先は 白灰の試練場と呼ばれる\n浮島だった。審判の天使:
The place you crashed was a floating island called
the White Ash Trial. There, you met Helvel, an Angel
of Judgment. She claimed that in order to obtain
the great power, you must undergo and pass the Four
Heavenly Trials. After cooperating with Lada Gart, the
champion of the Ogres, you managed to pass the
White Ash Trial. Afterwards, you made your way to
Fourion, the celestial city where angels lived. From
there, you began the task of undergoing the remaining
three trials.

288310.<center>黄金 深翠 紺碧の ３つの試練場では\n大地の三闘士 カブ ナン:
In the Golden, Deep Green, and Azure Trials, you
underwent, you met several other champions:
Kabu, Nanna, and Doltam of the Earthen Triad,
Hakuo, the second Time Sovereign, and Linashe,
the First Diva. After passing the remaining trials and
completing the Four Heavenly Trials, you made your
way to the Holy Grounds to meet with the Archangel
herself.

288311.<center>天使長ミトラーに命じられ みそぎを\nしようとすると 泉が汚染さ:
Mitra, the Archangel, instructed you to perform the
purification ritual. However, the spring becomes
filthy before you can. Together with the twins
Ashley and Leone, the first Hero and ally respectively,
you succeed in purifying the fountain once more.
When all of the champions finished the purification
ritual, the Archangel revealed that the great power
was to grant the power of the gods.

288312.<center>神化の儀の準備を待つ間 ユーライザに\n同僚の天使 アルビデを捜:
While awaiting the deification ritual to begin,
Yuliza asked you to find her colleague, an angel
named Albide. While exploring the Ancient Remains,
you find his corpse among a plant bearing strange
looking stones. Yuliza realizes the stone that was on
Albide's left hand is the same kind of stone that was
left behind by the monster contaminating the spring.
However, the stone on his hand was no longer there.
Albide's death was ruled an accident, and the deification
ritual proceeded as scheduled.

288313.<center>反感を抱く天使の 嫌がらせにより\n神化の儀に遅刻してしまうが:
The champions who had undergone the ritual were
all transformed into terrible fiends. Although you
managed subdue the fiendish Lada Gart, the other
fiends vanished without a trace. To track down their
whereabouts, you must go see the Archangel in the
Monastery.

293441.<center>導きの天使 ユーライザに招かれ\nアストルティア上空に現れた 浮:
Invited by Guidance Angel Yuliza, a floating
city appeared above Astoltia...Heaven,
Fourion. There, they will challenge the four
celestial stars in order to obtain the great
power that can protect the world.

293442.<center>試練に挑む中 アストルティアの歴史に\n名を残す 様々な英雄たち:
While challenging the trials, he met various
Heroes of the Heavens who have left their mark
on the history of Astoltia, and successfully
completed the Four Star Tour of the Heavens.

293443.<center>いよいよ 神化の儀式 当日。\n神化の炎を取り込んだ 英雄たちは:
Finally, the day of the deification ceremony
arrives. The heroes who have taken in the fire
of deification are engulfed in an evil flame
and transformed into fiends. They fight Fiend
Lada Gart, who has lost his senses due to the
curse, and win the battle, but the other
fiends tell Astoltia about their destiny.

293444.<center>英雄の悪神化は 何者かの手によって\n神化の光炉に 投げ込まれた:
Hero's transformation into an evil god was
caused by a cursed Fiend's Flame that was
thrown into the Fiery Furnace of Divinity by
an unknown entity. Archangel Mitra asked
Yuliza to come down to earth and subdue the
fiends that were rampaging in Astoltia, and
she and Yuliza went to Astoltia.

293445.<center>ドワチャッカ大陸で 大地の三闘士\nエルトナ大陸で 時の王者ハク:
On the Dwachakka Continent, in the Triad of
Eltona Continent, in the Hakuowena Islands,
the Champion of Time, Linashe, the Diva of the
Origin, fights against the heroes who have
turned into fiends. With the Divine Sword
Lectalis entrusted to her by Mitra, she
succeeds in saving the heroes by cutting off
the cursed flame that has been engulfing them.

293446.<center>フォーリオンに戻ると ルティアナの清泉で\n審判の天使ヘルヴェル:
Back in Fourion, Helvel, the Angel of
Judgment, awaits her at Lutiana's Spring. When
Yuliza, who adores Helvel, tries to hand over
the Fiend's Flame, Fostail, who has been
missing for some time, appears. He has been
independently searching for the truth behind
the events of the past years.

293447.<center>英雄たちを 悪神化させた犯人は\nヘルヴェルだった。悪神の火種を:
Helvel was the one who turned the heroes into
evil gods. Helvel, who took the Fiend's Flame
and attacked out of control, was defeated
together with Fostail, but the mystery remains
as to why she, an angel, betrayed Heaven
Township and committed the heinous act... In
order to pursue the remaining Fiend, let's
meet Archangel Mitra in Heaven Township's
Monastery.

300417.<center>導きの天使 ユーライザに招かれ\nアストルティア上空に現れた 浮:
Invited by the Guidance Angel Yuliza, she took
on the challenge of traveling to the four
stars of Heaven to receive the power of
greatness in the floating city that appeared
above Astoltia, the Heavenly City of Fourion.
After meeting various heroes, he underwent the
ritual of deification, but all the heroes
turned into fiends and scattered to Astoltia.

300418.<center>地上で暴れる 悪神たちは それぞれ\nゆかりのある土地で 心域と:
The fiends who were rampaging on earth were
trying to create a world called the Dark
Heartlands in their respective lands of
origin, and to bring about calamity. Hakuo,
Linashe, and the other Fiend Triads fought
deep within the Heartlands, but the Fiend's
Flame that had taken up residence in them was
detached and successfully quenched. They
returned to Heaven.

300419.<center>残る悪神 アシュレイとレオーネが動きだし\n紺碧の試練場の エネ:
The remaining fiends, Ashley and Leone, moved
to create a new heartlands inside a building
called the Azure Pillar of Creation, which
controls the energy of the Azure Trials. In
the hall beyond, Ashley and the Fiend's Flame
failed to separate the two, and they were
captured.

300420.<center>次にアシュレイが 襲撃したのは\n黄金の試練場だった。心域を抜け:
Ashley next attacked the Golden Trials. After
passing through the Dark Heartlands, he
defeated the Fiend's Flame Ashley and this
time succeeded in separating the Fiend's
Flame, but the damaged Divine Sword Lectalis
was finally broken. This battle caused the
Azure Trials and Golden Trials to run out of
energy, and they were forced to take action.

300421.<center>苦肉の策として 神都の余剰エネルギーを\nふたつの試練場に 供給:
As a desperate measure, the surplus energy of
the capital was supplied to the two trial
sites, but the wards protecting the Temple of
Eternity, which housed the treasure known as
the Shield of Astoltia, were lifted. Leone's
aim was there, and he kicked out the angels
guarding the temple of Eternity, and after
entering the temple, he generated his own
psychic field.

300422.<center>心域の先にある とこしえの神殿の最奥では\n天使長ミトラーを打ち:
At the far end of the Temple of Eternity,
beyond the Heart Realm, Archangel Mitra is
defeated and Leone takes possession of the
Shield of Astoltia. Leone destroys the Shield
of Astoltia by self-destructing Fiend's Left
Hand. Then the wards protecting the world
disappear, and a ship of an entity calling
itself Dia Kut telecrystal suddenly appears in
the skies above Heaven.

300423.<center>宣戦布告をしてきた ジア・ルミナと\n戦いになるが ヘルヴェルが:
They fight Dia Lumina, who declares war on
them, but Helvel sacrifices himself to destroy
the chains released from Dia Kut's ship. Hit
succeeds in repelling Dia Kut's ship, but
Mitra is missing. Dia Lumina vanishes along
with Leone. Let's go to the Monastery in
Heaven to see Kantis, the acting Archangel.

300424.<center>導きの天使 ユーライザに招かれ\nアストルティア上空に現れた 浮:
Invited by the Guidance Angel Yuliza, she took
on the challenge of traveling to the four
stars of Heaven to receive the power of
greatness in the floating city that appeared
above Astoltia, the Heavenly City of Fourion.
After meeting various heroes, he underwent the
ritual of deification, but all the heroes
turned into fiends and scattered to Astoltia.

300425.<center>地上で暴れる 悪神たちは それぞれ\nゆかりのある土地で 心域と:
The fiends who were rampaging on earth were
trying to create a world called the Dark
Heartlands in their respective lands of
origin, and to bring about calamity. Hakuo,
Linashe, and the other Fiend Triads fought
deep within the Heartlands, but the Fiend's
Flame that had taken up residence in them was
detached and successfully quenched. They
returned to Heaven.

300426.<center>残る悪神 アシュレイとレオーネが動きだし\n紺碧の試練場の エネ:
The remaining fiends, Ashley and Leone, moved
to create a new heartlands inside a building
called the Azure Pillar of Creation, which
controls the energy of the Azure Trials. In
the hall beyond, Ashley and the Fiend's Flame
failed to separate the two, and they were
captured.

300427.<center>次にアシュレイが 襲撃したのは\n黄金の試練場だった。心域を抜け:
Ashley next attacked the Golden Trials. After
passing through the Dark Heartlands, he
defeated the Fiend's Flame Ashley and this
time succeeded in separating the Fiend's
Flame, but the damaged Divine Sword Lectalis
was finally broken. This battle caused the
Azure Trials and Golden Trials to run out of
energy, and they were forced to take action.

300428.<center>苦肉の策として 神都の余剰エネルギーを\nふたつの試練場に 供給:
As a desperate measure, the surplus energy of
the capital was supplied to the two trial
sites, but the wards protecting the Temple of
Eternity, which housed the treasure known as
the Shield of Astoltia, were lifted. Leone's
aim was there, and he kicked out the angels
guarding the temple of Eternity, and after
entering the temple, he generated his own
psychic field.

300429.<center>心域の先にある とこしえの神殿の最奥では\n天使長ミトラーを打ち:
At the far end of the Temple of Eternity,
beyond the Heart Realm, Archangel Mitra is
defeated and Leone takes possession of the
Shield of Astoltia. Leone destroys the Shield
of Astoltia by self-destructing Fiend's Left
Hand. Then the wards protecting the world
disappear, and a ship of an entity calling
itself Dia Kut telecrystal suddenly appears in
the skies above Heaven.

300430.<center>宣戦布告をしてきた ジア・ルミナと\n戦いになるが ヘルヴェルが:
They fight Dia Lumina, who declares war on
them, but Helvel sacrifices himself to destroy
the chains released from Dia Kut's ship. Hit
succeeds in repelling Dia Kut's ship, but
Mitra is missing. Dia Lumina vanishes along
with Leone. Let's go to the Monastery in
Heaven to see Kantis, the acting Archangel.

302160.<center>導きの天使 ユーライザに招かれ\nアストルティア上空に現れた 浮:
Invited by the Guidance Angel Yuliza, she took
on the challenge of traveling to the four
stars of Heaven to receive the power of
greatness in the floating city that appeared
above Astoltia, the Heavenly City of Fourion.
After meeting various heroes, he underwent the
ritual of deification, but all the heroes
turned into fiends and scattered to Astoltia.

302161.<center>天使長の痕跡を求めて 魔窟アラモンドに\n着くと 帝王となった:
Arriving in Alamond Cavern in search of traces
of the Archangel, she is reunited with Mitra,
now an emperor. Despairing of her doomed fate,
she refuses to return to Heaven. However, in
order to protect the inhabitants of Alamond,
who adore the emperor, Archangel Mitra decides
to fight Dia Kut as an angel chief and returns
to Heaven.

302162.<center>対抗策を手に入れ ジア・クトの塔へ\n向かうと レオーネが出現し:
Received a countermeasure, he heads for Dia
Kut's tower, where Leone appears and flies
away, telling him to settle the score at the
top of the tower. After overcoming Leone's
Dark Heartlands and reaching the top, Ashley,
who had recovered from the Fiend's curse,
joined him and defeated Dia Lumina. However,
Dia Leone absorbs Lumina's power and
transforms into Dia Leone.

302163.<center>勝利に沸く天星郷だったが 魔眼の月が昇り\nジア・クトの首領 ジ:
Heaven was elated by the victory, but then the
Eye of Evil rose and Dia Ledo Genos, the
leader of Dia Kut, revealed himself. When the
time was ripe, he declared that he would
launch an all-out attack from the Demonic
Star's Evileye Moon, and Heaven was tinged
with fear. Archangel Mitra would like to have
a word with you, so let's go to the
Archangel's office on the second floor of the
monastery.

302167.<center>ラダ・ガート 三闘士 ハクオウ\nリナーシェ アシュレイらの悪神:
Lada Gart, the Fiend Triad, Hakuourinashe,
Ashley and others succeeded in breaking the
curse of the Fiend Triad and returning them to
Heaven, but Leone turned on Dia Kut
telecrystal and attacked the Temple of
Eternity, summoning Dia Lumina to him.
Helvel's death-defying blow forces Dia Lumina
to retreat, but the battle results in the
disappearance of Archangel Mitra.

302168.<center>天使長が戻った矢先 ジア・ルミナが\nバドリー岩石地帯の南に ジ:
Just as the Archangel returns, Dia Lumina
launches the Dia Kut tower to the south of the
Budley Rock Zone and announces the start of
the invasion. To fight Dia Kut, which
crystallizes all things, Mitra revealed the
existence of Tetral, a survivor of the Eternal
Cradle, whose story gave Fostail a clue that
led him to a countermeasure against
crystallization.

302169.<center>アシュレイと協力して ジア・レオーネを\n倒すが そこにジア・ク:
He and Ashley cooperate to defeat Dia Leone,
but then Dia Kut's huge army arrives and they
are doomed. However, just in the nick of time,
the heroes, who have been resurrected from the
curse of the fiend and received divine power,
rush to the scene, and through their
perfection, they Hit the hordes.
